description:
So first today not only has the Spanish bank Sabadell weathered the storm of Spain's financial crisis in fine style, it's in expansion mode. Its offer of around two and a half billion dollars for the British high-street bank TSB has been accepted, pending regulatory approval and it's just the latest in a string of acquisitions at home and abroad. Paul Pester is CEO of TSB and he put this statement on the bank's YouTube channel.

We are convinced that Sabadell share our vision for bringing more competition to UK banking, that Sabadell is gonna support us in the delivery of our retail strategy and actually importantly are gonna help us get into the small business banking market potentially faster than we would otherwise have done. Alongside that is clear that Sabadell share the values that we hold so dear at TSB and our real focus on bringing a different sort of banking to UK consumers. I think TSB will continue to go from strength to strength as part of the Sabadell group and I look forward to continuing to work with Sabadell as we really focus on making TSB Britain's challenger bank and bringing more competition to UK banking.

So how did Sabadell survive the crisis in Spain? Well, analysts have been pretty complimentary, describing the bank as ambitious, dynamic and cosmopolitan and more importantly very effective in mopping up rivals in worse shape than them.

title: 西班牙银行收购英国TSB银行（有声）

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

 说唱歌手Pitbull与拉丁天后詹妮弗·洛佩兹(Jenifer Lopez)以及巴西歌手克劳迪娅-莱特(Claudia Leitte)合唱的歌曲《We Are One (Ole Ola)》定为本届世界杯足球赛的主题曲。语言：英语 葡萄牙语
发行时间：2014-05-13
唱片公司：索尼音乐
流派：Pop

Put your flags up in the sky (put them in the sky Jogue lá no Alto)
挥起你的旗帜空中呼啦啦飘扬（风中旗帜飘扬 没有极限）
And wave them side to side (side to side Lado a Lado)
把他们挥遍（左右挥动 排排共舞）
Show the world where you're from(show them where you're from)
告诉全世界你是何方神圣 （告诉他们你来自哪里）
Show the world we are one (one love, life)
告诉全世界我们早已凝聚为一体 （穷尽一生只为这份爱）
Olê olê, olê olá
Olê olê, olê olá
Olê olê, olê olá
Olê olê, olê olá

讲解：

模唱：

想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
